body:
Hi Martin (your English is just fine),


1. I'm fairly certain we have some German/Austrian OpenStudio users...
2. Ruby 1.8.7 works just fine with OpenStudio -- in fact, yours is the same setup as I have (OSX10.8 + Ruby 1.8.7) 
3. The install doc you are working off of is outdated (see #4).
4. The Perl install directive is only for people running OpenStudio on Windows; OSX and Linux users most likely already have Perl installed (as well as Ruby). 


What version of OpenStudio are you trying to install? I highly recommend installing the latest iteration version, which is 0.9.3. That installer can be downloaded from the Developers tab on the OpenStudio website:


http://openstudio.nrel.gov/developers


Direct link to Mac installer:
http://openstudio.nrel.gov/accept/file/1162


Once you have that version installed, let us know how you make out. If you still have problems, please post some specifics about the nature of the problem. 


Cheers,


- Rob
